shortdesc.ph: Retrieves frame information of the video capture device under the specified video format.

p.codeblock: virtual int getCapability(const char* deviceIdUTF8, const uint32_t deviceCapabilityNumber, VideoFormat& capability) = 0;

section.p: After calling to get the number of video formats supported by the video capture device, you can call this method to get the video frame information corresponding to the specified index.
section.note: This method is only applicable on Windows and macOS platforms.

plentry.pd: ID of the video capture device.
Index of the video format. If the return value of is i, the value range of this parameter is [0, i).
An output parameter. Detailed information of the specified video format, including width (px), height (px), and frame rate (fps). See .
